Trade/Device Name(s): TeleRPM Gen2 Blood Glucose Monitoring System
Submitter Information: Guangdong Transtek Medical Electronics Co., Ltd.
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for TeleRPM Gen2 Blood Glucose Monitoring System using amperometric electrochemical detection for quantitative glucose measurement in capillary whole blood.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from the fingertip, for at-home self-testing by persons with diabetes to monitor diabetes control; not for neonatal use, diagnosis, or screening.
